formatted_items.content:
Subject: Information Request – Overview of Union Trust Bank’s Dispute-Resolution Process for Mark Thompson  

Hi Jane,

I’m preparing a consolidated response for journalist Mark Thompson (mark.thompson@journalist.com) regarding Union Trust Bank’s procedures for handling customer complaints and disputed transactions. Could you please help by sending me:

• A step-by-step outline of the dispute-resolution workflow (from initial complaint through final resolution/closure).  
• Typical timeframes, service-level targets, and escalation points.  
• Departments/roles involved at each stage and how customers are kept informed.  
• Any recent policy updates or improvements the Bank has implemented.  
• One or two anonymized case studies or metrics that illustrate outcomes (e.g., resolution rates, average turnaround times).  
• Links or references to any publicly available documents we can safely share with the press.

When convenient, please check your past email threads on this topic (or the Disputes & Complaints folder in Notion) for materials we may have already drafted that I can repurpose.

If possible, could you send the information by noon tomorrow so I can finalize Mark’s answers on schedule? Just let me know if you need extra time or have questions.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,  
[Your Name]
